## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e47ac4abea81954fc94c98709e47dc7d841ae9e110f7337e1bf97f765b0aff3b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'snacks-design-system' @ 10.20.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
